tool_description: This API will return details of books based on their ISBN.
name: Book detail
title: Book detail

api_list.name: isbn
api_list.description: This will return the details,  which are title,  author and year, of books based on isbn.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://book-detail1.p.rapidapi.com/api/0312942303"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "book-detail1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://book-detail1.p.rapidapi.com/api/{isbn}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "book-detail1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
